participant_1.background:
I am a good swimmer and I enjoy teaching my children to swim.
I've been spending more time at the farmers market since I quit my job.
my family is poor.
I'm single and enjoy my freedom, but I'm open to meeting someone special.
my car is blue.

participant_2.background:
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
i collect little figurines.
I have a close relationship with my family despite my hectic schedule.
i still love to line dry my clothes.
i like going on walks.

content.text: Hello. What's your name?
Hi. I'm Daniel. What's your name?
I'm Sarah. What do you like to do for fun?
I like going for walks, collecting figurines, and spending time with my family.
Those are all great hobbies. I like to go for walks too. What kind of figurines do you collect?
I collect little animal figurines. I have a whole shelf of them in my living room.
That's so cute! I love animals. What's your favorite animal?
I love dogs. They're so loyal and loving. What's your favorite animal?
I love cats. They're so independent and playful.
I love cats too! They're both great pets.
I'm glad we have similar tastes in animals.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
I agree. Do you have any other hobbies besides collecting figurines and going for walks?
I like to line dry my clothes. I think it's better for the environment.
I've never heard of that before. What does that mean?
It means hanging your clothes outside to dry instead of using a dryer.
Oh, that's interesting. I might have to try that.
I think you would like it. It's a great way to save energy and money.
Thanks for the tip. I'll definitely give it a try.
You're welcome! I hope you like it
